chara.textHome: There you are, I've been waiting.
I'm assuming you have your weapon?
Well, then let's get going!
Time to hunt those fruits of the sea!

Sorry for bothering you this early, but
would you mind gutting this one for me?

I caught it this morning, I just know
it's going to be good.
Hmm... *Munch*

I would've thought everything at these
beachfront restaurants would be expensive,
but surprisingly they're not.
Strange and delicious...

It's all still a little too expensive
for me, though.

A summer sunset is like a window
into your past...

It reminds me of that lonely side of Mitama
she once showed me.

That night... It must've been
during the summer.

This is the time when I'm usually heading
back home after my part-time job.

When I feel the nice evening breeze,
I almost feel guilty for enjoying it.
It's strange.

We need to stretch before
we go into the ocean.

Prepare your open stance...
 Get ready to grab your target...
1, 2, 3, GO!

It'd be nice if they'd relax
while we're on vacation...

Well, now that I've sensed the Witch,
I have no choice but to take care of it.
Who cares if I'm in my swimsuit.

It's quite possible that swimsuits might
actually be good for physical performance...

Maybe I'll test out my theory
out in Endless Mirrors.
Do you know about the Delicious Spell?

By saying it you can apparently make
someone's food taste better.
It may even work on this seafood right here.
Wait, that can't be...

It would've made sense if swim class
was first period.

Wearing your swimsuit under your clothes
to school. Is that weird?
It feels good, doesn't it?

When you start to feel hot, nothing feels
better than a cold water bottle on your neck,
legs, or under your armpit.
It saves money on electricity as well.

Fisherman, ship workers, basically anyone
who works on the ocean... They're so cool.

You can't forget about the people who work
on the beach either.

All that blood, sweat, and tears...
It's beautiful.
I was able to find a pretty cheap swimsuit.
Well I didn't, Mitama did.

Although she did mess around with me
a bunch, she got the job done well.

I have an idea... What do you think about
an ocean maid cafe?

It may be a good way to pair work
with a vacation.

I should probably run it by the more
senior maids first...
Trying breathing like this...

This is how my father taught me
to swim when he took us to
the beach when I was young.
It warms my heart just thinking about it...
If you get into try not to worry.

I'm going to spend my time here
honing my survival skills.

You can find couples on the beach getting
close without worrying about
the people around them.

It weird, when you really think about it,
Yachiyo, Mifuyu, and I could get
married at our age if we wanted to.
